clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Atosiban is indicated for use in delaying imminent pre term birth in pregnant adult women with regular uterine contractions of at least 30 s duration at a rate of at least 4 per 30 min a cervical dilation of 1 3cm 0 3cm for nulliparas and effacement of at least 50 a gestational age of 24 33 weeks a normal fetal heart rate

contraindications.disease: No systemic toxicities were found in rat and dog studies at dosages equivalent to 10 times normal human exposure L2469 It is thought that the risk of toxicity is low due to the short duration of action and short half life of atosiban A32685
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Atosiban reduces the frequency of uterine contractions to delay pre term birth in adult females and induces uterine quiescence L2469 A32685

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Isoetharine is combined with Atosiban
